mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id AS memberId, m.profile_image AS profileImage, m.nickname AS nickname, m.introduction AS introduction FROM member m WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET profile_image = #{request.profileImage}, nickname = #{request.nickname}, introduction = #{request.introduction}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
